SHOES.TITLE: CONVERSE
SHOES.NAME: Converse Jack Purcell
SHOES.DESCRIPTION: This is the iconic Converse Jack Purcell sneaker
SHOES.DESCRIPTION1: that has fundamentally gone unchanged since the 1930s.
SHOES.DESCRIPTION2: It has a durable canvas upper, canvas lining and removable EVA insert for comfort,
SHOES.DESCRIPTION3: traditional metal eyelets, rubber-wrapped midsole, classic light-blue rubber outsole,
SHOES.DESCRIPTION4: medial-side air vent holes for breathability
SHOES.DESCRIPTION5: and the unmistakable Jack Purcell smile on the toe cap.

SHOES.TITLE: VANS
SHOES.NAME: Vans old skool
SHOES.DESCRIPTION2: and the first to bare the iconic side stripe,
SHOES.DESCRIPTION3: has a low-top lace-up silhouette with a durable suede
SHOES.DESCRIPTION4: and canvas upper with padded tongue and lining

SHOES.TITLE: NIKE
SHOES.NAME: Nike Air Yeezy
SHOES.DESCRIPTION: When it comes to retail releases, Kanye West can’t miss.
SHOES.DESCRIPTION1: From his work with the Swoosh to his work with the Stripes,
SHOES.DESCRIPTION2: nearly ever silo and color code he’s spawned has sold out and done so in record time.
SHOES.DESCRIPTION3: So, what would we get if we swapped a classic colorway he’s introduced with Nike
SHOES.DESCRIPTION4: on that of a model he made with adidas or Louis Vuitton — or vice versa? Well,
SHOES.DESCRIPTION5: we decided to see exactly what that would look like in the latest Photoshop Friday.

SHOES.TITLE: ADIDAS
SHOES.NAME: Adidas Yeezy
SHOES.DESCRIPTION: Announced in 2013 and officially released in 2015,
SHOES.DESCRIPTION1: the Yeezy collection is the home of cultural icon Kanye West's footwear
SHOES.DESCRIPTION2: and apparel designs created in partnership with adidas.
SHOES.DESCRIPTION3: Spanning several "Yeezy Seasons", the ongoing collaborative collection features
SHOES.DESCRIPTION4: West's popular Yeezy Boost sneakers as well as

SHOES.TITLE: REEBOK
SHOES.NAME: Reebok trail running men's all terrain
SHOES.DESCRIPTION: Born from the trenches of Spartan Races,
SHOES.DESCRIPTION1: the Reebok AllTerrain Super is engineered with more cushioning
SHOES.DESCRIPTION2: and stability for longer distance races.
SHOES.DESCRIPTION3: The AllTerrain Series has been designed in partnership
SHOES.DESCRIPTION4: with the Reebok Spartan Race community and elite racers.

SHOES.TITLE: TIMBERLAND
SHOES.NAME: Timberland Killington Chukka Boots
SHOES.DESCRIPTION1: Our Killington men's chukkas dominate everything
SHOES.DESCRIPTION2: from city sidewalks to places off the beaten path.
SHOES.DESCRIPTION3: Active athletic outsoles take on the terrain of your day,
SHOES.DESCRIPTION4: while premium leathers and breathable mesh keep your feet
